name: Acorn Rush Warrior Simulator 2
description:
Global Game Jam Project Made in 48h with the KALARAB team.

Pitch : Brave little acorn ! Defend your trees from the forest with your gigantic arms from a zombie acorn invasion that comes back in waves !

Team list : 

Quentin  Bensmaine : Game Designer & Game Prog

Romain Chave : Game Designer, Tech artiste, Integrator Unreal (asset & animation) & Foliage Master

Hugo Pupet : Rigger, Animator, Modeler 3D & SFX Artiste
Mathias Rabellino : Texture Artiste (substance Painter & Designer)
Quentin Caminsuli : Rigger, Animator & UI/UX
Dorian Baey : Concept artiste, Illustrator & VFX Artiste

Guillaume Restoul : Modeler 3D, Level Artiste & Tech Artiste
